CatDescriptText: Miss Sandra Phol, cashier, 1210 Tyndall Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that 18-year-olds should be given the privilege of voting?" answer reads: "Yes. I figure that if the boys are old enough to fight, they are old enough to vote."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of  Sandra Phol wearing light colored blouse with bird embroidery and plaid skirt, standing on corner of Fifth and Liberty Avenues, Thrift Drugs and Kappels stores in background, Downtown
